titleStmt.title: Here foloweth a lytell treatyse of the beaute of women newly translated out of Frenshe in to Englishe
Beauty of women.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by Rycharde Fawkes dwellyng in duram rent,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date estimated by STC.
Identified as STC 24220 on UMI microfilm reel 148.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 148 and at reel 874 (same copy filmed twice).
